summary: The module implements a Moto-based mock of the AWS IoT service, defining custom exception types, in‑memory data models for IoT resources (certificates, policies, things, jobs, rules, etc.), and a response layer that translates backend objects into HTTP responses for CRUD and association operations.
business_intent: Allow developers to write and run automated tests against IoT‑related code without contacting real AWS services, by providing a fully functional, locally hosted simulation of the IoT API.
